data.title: The Bartlett Summer Show Book 2024
data.meta_description: The Bartlett Summer Show Book 2024 is a comprehensive companion to the Bartlett Summer Show, the school's flagship exhibition. This richly illustra...
data.text: The Bartlett Summer Show Book 2024 is a comprehensive companion to the Bartlett Summer Show, the school's flagship exhibition. This richly illustrated guide comprises five programmes of study, with innovative and compelling projects by students from our Architecture BSc, Architectural & Interdisciplinary Studies BSc, Architecture MSci, Engineering & Architectural Design MEng and Architecture MArch programmes. The extraordinary spectrum of visual work is accompanied by excerpts from history and theory essays and theses as well as design research projects. The book also offers a window into life and work at The Bartlett, one of the world's top architecture schools. Browse The Bartlett Summer Show 2024 online from 21 June â€“ 06 July at bartlettarchucl.com.
